general_advisory: Farmers are advised to maintain standing water levels, irrigate fields, manage foot rot disease in paddy, apply necessary fertilizers and insecticides, and use pre-emergence herbicides for weed control.

advisory: To manage stem borer, use Trichogramma japonicum card at weekly intervals.
To manage stem rot, drench soil with Validamycin 3% L or Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP.
Select resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease.
Soak setts in specified solution for planting.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray recommended fungicides.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray recommended fungicides.
To control cut worm, spray recommended insecticides.
To control mites, spray recommended insecticides.
To control aphids, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage diseases, spray recommended fungicides at specified intervals.
To control black spot disease, spray Copper Oxy-chloride.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernating.
